name: Jockbrokers
overview:
Jockbrokers is the world’s first sport’s investing platform. The Jockbroker’s market is a patent-pending platform that allows users to buy/sell shares of their favorite athletes. The market offers:

+Marketplace for investing in trading cards that represent your favorite athletes.

+Initial Player Release (IPR): Own jock shares of your favorite athlete!

+Portfolio Auctions (PA) : Auction Bid on other users bulk portfolios.

+Buy/Sell (): Trade 24/7 year round!

+Performance Bonuses (PB): Earn monthly/season-ending cash bonuses for multiple stat categories.

+HOF BuyBacks (HOF): Jockbrokers will buy back shares of athletes who qualify under our top-ten tier Hall of Fame performance table.

Jockbrokers limits the supply in the market so that traders can be confident when making transactions. At Jockbrokers there is a direct link between the performance of the athlete and the value of the card because they guarantee to re-purchase the card at specific prices based on the career performance of the athlete. In short, Jockbrokers takes the guesswork out of the trading card market.
